actions.description: Updates an installed profile tab for a page

position.description: Order in which the tab will appear on the profile. Must be after permanent tabs and less than the number of installed tabs. Index starts at 0

custom_name.description: Name to be used for the tab. If this is set to an empty string, the tab will use the applications default tab name.

is_non_connection_landing_tab.description: Set this tab as the default landing tab for users who have not liked and are not admins of the Page. If provided, value must be true.

display_order.description: Order of this achievement as it shows up in the achievement stories UI (low to high). For example a display order of 100 will be displayed in the UI before 200.
